abstract: Facing foot surgery, Harry Hurt III crisscrosses Manhattan in pursuit of a walking stick.
snippet: Facing foot surgery, Harry Hurt III crisscrosses Manhattan in pursuit of a walking stick.
lead_paragraph: I CRAWLED out of bed on all fours, nursing and cursing the second toe on my left foot. Outside my bedroom window, the early morning Manhattan sky loomed dark and foreboding like an ancient oracle. As the inevitable rain began to fall, I recalled the riddle of the Sphinx from a high school course in Greek mythology:

headline.main: Walking Slowly and Carrying a Big Stick
headline.print_headline: Walking Slowly and Carrying a Big Stick
